nodes.text: A female individual was present on the planet Onderon during the Onderon Civil War in 3951 BBY. During that time, the person killed Captain Sullio, a member of the Onderonian military, and destroyed the protocol droid S-0D3-GE3 immediately after the droid discovered Sullio's body. Dhagon Ghent, a local doctor, was arrested for the murder of Sullio but was eventually proven innocent through the work of a former Jedi Knight named Meetra Surik.

Sullio's murderer's appeared in the Star Wars Legends role-playing video game Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords. The murderer appears briefly during the Onderon portion of the game.
